TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListBox/SelectedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListBox.SelectedIndexCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示这样的集合，该集合包含 中选定项的索引。

span.span: Represents the collection containing the indexes to the selected items in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储中选定项的索引。 The class stores the indexes to the selected items in the . 存储在中的索引是类中的索引位置。The indexes stored in the are index positions within the class. 类存储中显示的所有项。 The class stores all items displayed in the . 下表是一个示例, 说明如何在示例中存储的项以及其选择状态。The following table is an example of how the stores the items of the as well as their selection states within an example . |IndexIndex|项Item|列表框中的选择状态Selection state within the ListBox| |-----------|----------|----------------------------------------| |00|object1object1|未选定Unselected| |11|object2object2|已选定Selected| |22|object3object3|未选定Unselected| |33|object4object4|已选定Selected| |44|object5object5|已选定Selected| 根据上表中的示例, 下表演示了将如何显示。Based on the example in the previous table, the following table demonstrates how the would appear. |IndexIndex|ObjectCollection 中选定项的索引Index of selected item in ObjectCollection| |-----------|------------------------------------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 您可以使用此类的属性和方法来使用集合执行各种任务。You can use the properties and methods of this class to perform a variety of tasks with the collection. 使用方法, 您可以确定类中的索引位置是否为存储在中的所选索引的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the class is a member of the selected indexes stored in the . 一旦您知道该项位于集合中, 就可以使用方法来确定在中存储的特定索引位置的位置。Once you know that the item is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where a specific index position within the for the is stored. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法在的项中搜索搜索文本的所有实例。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the . 该示例使用方法的版本, 通过该版本可以指定起始搜索索引, 以便对中的所有项进行持续搜索。The example uses the version of the method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the . 该示例还演示了如何确定方法在到达项列表的底部后从列表顶部开始搜索, 以防止递归搜索。The example also demonstrates how to determine when the method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search. 在中找到项后, 使用方法选择这些项。Once items are found in the , they are selected using the method. [!code-cpp[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法, 您可以确定类中的索引位置是否为存储在中的所选索引的成员。The method enables you to determine whether an index position from the class is a member of the selected indexes stored in the . 您可以使用此选项来确定是否选择多重选择中的特定项。You can use this to determine whether a specific item in a multiple-selection is selected.

span.span: Copies the entire collection into an existing array at a specified location within the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法将所选索引从多个集合合并到一个数组中。You can use this method to combine the selected indexes from multiple collections into a single array.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取集合中的项数。

span.span: Gets the number of items in the collection.
The number of items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您可以确定中的选定项的数目。This property enables you to determine the number of selected items in the . 然后, 可以在循环遍历集合的值时使用此值, 并且需要提供多个迭代来执行循环。You can then use this value when looping through the values of the collection and you need to provide a number of iterations to perform the loop. 除非将的属性设置为`SelectionMode.MultiSimple`或`SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, 否则此属性始终返回零 (0) 或一 (1) 的值, 具体取决于是否具有选定的项。 Unless the property of the is set to `SelectionMode.MultiSimple` or `SelectionMode.MultiExtended`, this property always returns a value of zero (0) or one (1) depending on whether you have a selected item. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法在的项中搜索搜索文本的所有实例。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to search for all instances of the search text in the items of the . 该示例使用方法的版本, 通过该版本可以指定起始搜索索引, 以便对中的所有项进行持续搜索。The example uses the version of the method that enables you to specify a starting search index from which to do a continual search of all items in the . 该示例还演示了如何确定方法在到达项列表的底部后从列表顶部开始搜索, 以防止递归搜索。The example also demonstrates how to determine when the method begins searching from the top of the list after it reaches the bottom of the list of items to prevent a recursive search. 在中找到项后, 使用方法选择这些项。Once items are found in the , they are selected using the method. [!code-cpp[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListBox.FindString#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListBox.FindString/VB/form1.vb#1)]
